faq_items.question: How does Docsie's publishing system allow teams to work on documentation without affecting the live version?
faq_items.answer: Docsie allows you to create and edit documentation versions that can be set as 'active' or 'primary' using the pencil tool, or kept inactive. This means your team can write and update documentation behind the scenes without it being visible to customers until you're ready to publish it to production.

faq_items.question: What deployment options does Docsie offer for publishing documentation?
faq_items.answer: Docsie offers flexible deployment options including custom domain deployment and the ability to publish either individual books or entire shelves. You can configure deployments through the platform's deployment dashboard and get a simple script to embed your documentation portal directly into your website.

faq_items.question: Can I customize the appearance of my Docsie documentation portal to match my brand?
faq_items.answer: Yes, Docsie provides extensive customization options including various plugins, features, and documentation tools to enhance your knowledge portal. Additionally, Docsie offers a comprehensive CSS styling guide that helps you create a documentation portal that matches your brand's look and feel.

faq_items.question: How simple is it to embed Docsie documentation into an existing website?
faq_items.answer: Embedding Docsie documentation is extremely simple - it requires just one line of code. After configuring your deployment settings, Docsie generates a deployment script that you simply copy and paste into your HTML, making integration seamless regardless of your existing website setup.

faq_items.question: What additional features and plugins are available to enhance my documentation portal?
faq_items.answer: Docsie offers various plugins, features, and documentation tools that make your knowledge portals more robust and user-friendly. These additional features can be configured during the deployment setup and can be changed at any time, giving you flexibility to enhance your documentation as your needs evolve.
